Core:PCProperties.Core:Property: "Locate a character or object and display the woename of their environment.\\r\\nAdditionally, if the object has UrChildren, each child and its location is displayed as well."
"+whereis kalle\\r\\n Locate the character body \\"Kalle\\"\\r\\n\\r\\n+whereis Game:drinks:beer\\r\\n Locate the woename Game:drinks:beer"
